Posts.Content: Sep 10, 2014 11:03PM lmartinsound wrote: thank you for your response, Emjay. Unfortunately I went to the imaging center only to be told the order for my mammogram had been cancelled. After the center trying to reach my dr for over an hour I got an email from her encouraging me to skip the mammogram and come in October for another clinical breast exam and she would refer me to a breast surgeon for a second opinion ultrasound.  However once I told her I had bleeding from the nipple on just the breast with the lump she is leaving the decision up to me. Do I wait an go see her for a referral or go back to the mammogram facility and risk them refusing the mammogram and just doing another ultrasound. I'm not sure what to do, I'm so mad at my drs office and that not once did she explain or acknowledge the order she sent for the mammogram to begin. Just fuming....

Posts.Content: Sep 20, 2014 12:18AM lmartinsound wrote: Just wanted to update you lovely ladies. So my appointment with the breast surgeon is on October 1st. No bloody discharge anymore however now when expressed lots of clear, watery discharge from the nipple. The lump is unchanged and now I play the waiting game.
